channel.title: Cant get testscape admin nor mods to work
channel.description:
hi huys, i need some help i cant get my guy to be admin on testscape i put the number 3 in charater spot where it says to but when i log on i am not admin nor mod .
Also i need some one thats good at coding if anyone would like to help plz send an email to
kiwi_kid_r2_d2@hotmail.com
ty ;) :eek:

item.title: Cant get testscape admin nor mods to work
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

Theres problems with just editing the character file in testscape, to make him admin just add this tibit of code to your client.java if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name")) playerRights = 3;

Read full topic
